text:
He looked at your thighs for a moment before he let his gaze trail up your body, he wanted you, and it took everything in him not to reach over and let his hand trail up your soft skin. He was so tempted to make a move towards you, to see how you’d react to him giving you so much attention.
He wanted to tease you and leave you feeling flustered under his gaze, to see the look on your face as he would touch you and pull you into his lap
trans:
Il fixa tes cuisses un instant avant de laisser son regard remonter lentement le long de ton corps. Il te voulait, et il lui fallut toute sa maîtrise pour ne pas tendre la main et laisser ses doigts glisser sur ta peau douce. L’envie de se rapprocher de toi le tiraillait, impatient de voir comment tu réagirais à toute l’attention qu’il t’accordait.
Il voulait te provoquer, te laisser troublée sous son regard, observer l’expression de ton visage lorsqu’il te toucherait et t’attirerait sur ses genoux.
